widget.label: Verify Your Log In Credentials
widget.tooltip: Enter your log in information below then click the Log In button.
widget.help: This form allows you to access pages that require you to have logged in recently in your Snap! website. Enter your email address and password and then click on Log In to get a full log in session.

widget.label: Email
widget.tooltip: Enter your email address to log into your Snap! Website account.
widget.help: Enter the email address you used to register with Snap!. All of the Snap! Websites run by Made to Order Software Corp. allow you to use the same log in credentials.

widget.label: Password
widget.tooltip: Enter your password, if you forgot your password, just the link below to request a change.
widget.help: Enter the password you used while registering with Snap!. Your password is the same for all the Snap! Websites run by Made to Order Software Corp.

widget.label: OK
widget.tooltip: Click here to fully log back into your website. This gives you full access to anything you have the right to see and edit.
widget.help: Click to log in and go back to the page you were trying to access.

widget.label: Cancel
widget.tooltip: Click here to return to the home page
widget.help: Click "Cancel" in order to return to the home page instead of logging in.
